TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit OutputCacheProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class OutputCacheProvider Inherits ProviderBase

Docs.summary: Serves as a base class that contains abstract methods for implementing an output-cache provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有的輸出快取提供者必須實作中的抽象方法<xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider>類別。

block.para:
當您繼承自，您必須覆寫下列成員:-
-
-
-

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object Add (string key, object entry, DateTime utcExpiry);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Add(string key, object entry, valuetype System.DateTime utcExpiry) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function Add (key As String, entry As Object, utcExpiry As DateTime) As Object
public: abstract System::Object ^ Add(System::String ^ key, System::Object ^ entry, DateTime utcExpiry);
abstract member Add : string * obj * DateTime -> obj

Docs.param: The content to add to the output cache.
The time and date on which the cached entry expires.
Docs.summary: Inserts the specified entry into the output cache.
Docs.returns: A reference to the specified provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的索引鍵的快取中已經有一個值，該值必須傳回提供者。 提供者必須儲存資料要傳遞使用<xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider.Add%2A>方法參數。 <xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider.Add%2A>方法儲存的資料，如果它已經不在快取中。 如果資料快取中，<xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider.Add%2A>方法會傳回它。

Docs.param: A unique identifier for a cached entry in the output cache.
Docs.summary: Returns a reference to the specified entry in the output cache.
Docs.returns: The value that identifies the specified entry in the cache, or if the specified entry is not in the cache.

Docs.param: The unique identifier for the entry to remove from the output cache.
Docs.summary: Removes the specified entry from the output cache.

Docs.param: The content to add to the output cache.
The time and date on which the cached entry expires.
Docs.summary: Inserts the specified entry into the output cache, overwriting the entry if it is already cached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中指定的到期日期`utcExpiry`永遠是絕對到期日。
